capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm not sure about Petunia being an adult. I mean, she's definitely a mature plant and all, but I've seen her bloom with such vibrant colors, it's hard to imagine her as anything other than young at heart!

I'm thinking of getting a pet, and I've always been drawn to the name Petunia. It's such a unique and charming name for an adult - I can just imagine it on a beautiful bouquet of flowers or a vintage-inspired garden statue.
